title: Design and Operational Methods for Computer-Supported Blended Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pedagogy, science subject knowledge, and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A practice-centered curriculum enabling pre-service teachers to design and operate collaborative learning in blended environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the components of CSCBL scripts and their technology integration methods.
Learners can design collaborative learning flows based on IMS Learning Design.
Learners can develop strategies to support activity transitions between spaces using various technological tools.
Learners can apply an automated group formation system tailored to learner characteristics and task types.

resources: Collaboration Platform (e.g., Google Workspace, Microsoft Teams)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
